title: No, Rahul Gandhi Didn’t Have ‘Chicken Biryani’ With Imran Khan
subtitle: Rahul Gandhi with Imran Khan Viral Photo Fact Check: A viral post suggesting that Rahul Gandhi and Imran Khan had chicken biryani together has been circulating on social media. It is a doctored image.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A picture depicting Congress President Rahul Gandhi having a meal with Pakistan PM Imran Khan has gone viral. The caption says, “ये इमरान मियां के साथ चिकन बिरयानी कौन खा रहा है; अब होगा न्याय जनता करेगी”

The image has been widely circulated on Facebook.
